maniac:Limbo.DESCRIPTION: While in Limbo, take #b25% more damage. NL Upon entering Limbo, gain [E]. NL At the start of your turn, exit Limbo if your HP is above half.

maniac:Weakness.DESCRIPTION: Creatures with weakness receive more damage from #yAttacks.

maniac:Unreal.DESCRIPTION: Unreal cards can not be recalled once they are exhausted.

maniac:Bleeding.DESCRIPTION: Bleeding creatures lose additional HP upon being attacked.

maniac:Frightened.DESCRIPTION: Frightened creatures deal less damage and receive more damage.

maniac:Slow.DESCRIPTION: Slow creatures receive more damage for each card you play in a single turn.

maniac:Track.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top X cards of one of your card piles, you may choose some of them to add to your hand and the rest will be exhausted.

maniac:Tracked.DESCRIPTION: Trigger after you track the card pile if this card is still in that pile.

maniac:Weapon.DESCRIPTION: Weapons are #b0 -cost card that gives special effects in specific cases.

maniac:Enchant.DESCRIPTION: Enchanting cards gives each a specific enchantment. Cards can be enchanted many times but the enchantment is fixed at first time.

maniac:Gremlin.DESCRIPTION: Gremlins are friendly minions that fight for you and provide different assistance.

maniac:Enhance.DESCRIPTION: Increase the abilities of friendly Gremlins randomly, possibly between #b0 and #b2 .

maniac:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Creatures with #yInferno #yFlame lose HP at the end of their turns.

maniac:Doom.DESCRIPTION: Doomed creatures lose HP equal to a percentage of their max HP.

maniac:Agonal.DESCRIPTION: Agonal creatures take damage equal to a percentage of their lost HP upon receiving damage.
